name: Camera Man
description:
Developed by @thebones and @The Gecko

This is our entry for MiniJam 112: Chrono! For both us developers, this is the very first time we're participating in a game jam + making a game using godot. We've only had very little game development experience before MiniJam, and we're so happy we managed to submit a working game in the end! We had a lot of fun making Camera Man, and we hope you enjoy playing it too :D
We're hoping to continue working on this game, so stay tuned for updates.

Have fun taking photos!
